column4: hey im using the windows wireless driver i think its called ndwarpper but i would like to know if i could not use that and just install a driver for my wireless card
how do i find that out i would have to go over to windows to find out
check this mate will help you find out http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_open_source_wireless_drivers
download the driver from the site and extract the .zip file and read README.TXT instructions are inside
